str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Already; now at length, now after all this waiting. Apparently from e and de; even now.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: To go down, come down, either from the sky or from higher land, descend. From kata and the base of basis; to descend.

(a) (as adj.) enslaved, (b) (as noun) a (male) slave. From deo; a slave.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To meet, go to meet. From hupo and a derivative of anti; to go opposite under, i.e. To encounter, fall in with.

str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

Perhaps from paio; a boy, or, a girl, and a child; specially, a slave or servant.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.
